Nov. 10, 1899 D Australian Championships (A Grade)
Australian Championships (A Grade) 10 Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest Australian Championships australian-championships-a-grade
Australia
A Grade
Set Test and Own Choice
Bathurst, New South Wales, Australia Reported in some newspapers as the "Championship of Australasia".
Two own choice pieces, no set piece.
The Quickstep March was a main attraction Band Music Drill Total 1.Code's 71 65 136 2.Hillgrove 71 62 133 3.N S W Lancers 70 62 132 4.Newtown 72 57 129 5.Wellington Garrison 71 57 128 6.Bathurst City 71 54 125 7.Bathurst District 69 51 120 7.Armidale City 70 50 120 9Lithgow Model 71 41 112 .
